15-year-old.context: Open reduction and internal plate and screw fixation of depressed anterior table right frontal sinus, transconjunctival exploration of orbital floor, open reduction of nasal septum and nasal pyramid fracture with osteotomy.

depressed anterior table right frontal s.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 1. Depressed anterior table frontal sinus fracture on the right side.

right nasoorbital ethmoid fracture.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 2. Right nasoorbital ethmoid fracture.

right orbital blowout fracture with entr.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 3. Right orbital blowout fracture with entrapped periorbita.

nasal septal and nasal pyramid fracture.context: Preoperative Diagnoses: 4. Nasal septal and nasal pyramid fracture with nasal airway obstruction.

open reduction and internal plate and sc.context: Operation: 1. Open reduction and internal plate and screw fixation of depressed anterior table right frontal sinus.

transconjunctival exploration of right o.context: Operation: 2. Transconjunctival exploration of right orbital floor with release of entrapped periorbita.

open reduction of nasal septum and nasal.context: Operation: 3. Open reduction of nasal septum and nasal pyramid fracture with osteotomy.

gull-wing incision.context: The patient was placed in the supine position. Under affects of general endotracheal anesthesia, head and neck were prepped and draped with pHisoHex solution and draped in the appropriate sterile fashion. A gull-wing incision was drawn over the forehead scalp.

hair removal.context: Hair was removed along the suture line and incision was made to skin and subcutaneous tissue of the scalp down to, but not including the pericranium.

depression of the anterior table of the.context: The depression of the anterior table of the frontal sinus was noted.

mucocele.context: A mucocele was removed from the frontal sinus.

significant depression of the nasal bone.context: There is significant depression of the nasal bone on the left side.

high septal deviation.context: There is a high septal deviation, which would not allow complete correction of the deviation.

entrapped periorbita.context: There was entrapped periorbita, which was released to the fractures, which were repositioned, but not fixed in position.

nasal pyramid was satisfactorily mobiliz.context: The nasal pyramid was satisfactorily mobilized as well as the nasal septum and brought back to midline position with the help of a Boies elevator for the septum.

nasal septum was satisfactorily mobilize.context: The nasal pyramid was satisfactorily mobilized as well as the nasal septum and brought back to midline position with the help of a Boies elevator for the septum.

nasal septum and nasal pyramid fracture.context: Postoperative Diagnoses: 4. Nasal septal and nasal pyramid fracture with nasal airway obstruction.

1.3-mm screws and plate fixation.context: Multiple 1.3-mm screws and plate fixation were utilized to recontour the anterior forehead.

Xylocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine.context: Local infiltration anesthesia 1% Xylocaine with 1:100,000 epinephrine was infiltrated in the conjunctival fornix of the right lower eyelid as well as the inferior orbital rim.

palpebral conjunctiva and capsular palpe.context: An incision was made in the palpebral conjunctiva and capsular palpebral fascia beneath the tarsal plate preseptal approach to the inferior orbital rim was performed in this fashion.

inferior orbital rim.context: Dissection proceeded down to the inferior orbital rim and subperiosteal dissection was performed over the orbital floor.

orbital floor.context: Dissection proceeded down to the inferior orbital rim and subperiosteal dissection was performed over the orbital floor.

Boies elevator.context: The nasal pyramid was satisfactorily mobilized as well as the nasal septum and brought back to midline position with the help of a Boies elevator for the septum.

Kennedy Merocel sponges.context: Mastisol Orthoplast splint was prepared after the Doyle splints were placed in the nose and secured with 3-0 Prolene suture and the nose packed with two Kennedy Merocel sponges.

Mastisol Orthoplast splint.context: Mastisol Orthoplast splint was prepared after the Doyle splints were placed in the nose and secured with 3-0 Prolene suture and the nose packed with two Kennedy Merocel sponges.

Doyle splints.context: Mastisol Orthoplast splint was prepared after the Doyle splints were placed in the nose and secured with 3-0 Prolene suture and the nose packed with two Kennedy Merocel sponges.

3-0 Prolene suture.context: Mastisol Orthoplast splint was prepared after the Doyle splints were placed in the nose and secured with 3-0 Prolene suture and the nose packed with two Kennedy Merocel sponges.

4-inch Ace.context: A supportive mildly compressive dressing with fluffs, Kerlix, and 4-inch Ace were applied.

Kerlix.context: A supportive mildly compressive dressing with fluffs, Kerlix, and 4-inch Ace were applied.

fluffs.context: A supportive mildly compressive dressing with fluffs, Kerlix, and 4-inch Ace were applied.
